## Pool.createTemporalFramebuffer() method

Creates a temporal framebuffer from the object pool.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createTemporalFramebuffer(autoRelease: boolean, colorAttachments: BaseTexture[], depthAttachment?: BaseTexture, sampleCount?: number, ignoreDepthStencil?: boolean, attachmentMipLevel?: number, attachmentCubeface?: number, attachmentLayer?: number): FrameBuffer;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

autoRelease


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

Whether the framebuffer should be automatically released at the next frame.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

colorAttachments


</td><td>

[BaseTexture](doc/markdown/./device.basetexture.md)<!-- -->\[\]


</td><td>

Array of color attachments for the framebuffer.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

depthAttachment


</td><td>

[BaseTexture](doc/markdown/./device.basetexture.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Depth attachment for the framebuffer.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

sampleCount


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The sample count for the framebuffer, default is 1.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

ignoreDepthStencil


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether to ignore depth stencil when resolving msaa framebuffer, default is true.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

attachmentMipLevel


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The mipmap level to which the color attachment will render, default is 0.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

attachmentCubeface


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The cubemap face to which the color attachment will render, default is 0.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

attachmentLayer


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The texture layer to which the color attachment will render, default is 0.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[FrameBuffer](doc/markdown/./device.framebuffer.md)

The fetched FrameBuffer object.
